document.full_text: the pace of growth in the january-to-march quarter eased from the 8.3 percent expansion in the previous quarter, as rising interest rates crimped consumption and investment.
document.title: india's cooling measures slow its growth to 7.8%
lines_and_colors: the pace of growth in the january-to-march quarter eased from the 8.3 percent expansion in the previous quarter, as rising interest rates crimped consumption and investment.
